content: Verses chosen are sermon material and had me using this app mostly to motivate more bible reading than any want of memorization. Unfortunately, recently purchased King James version of the bible and quickly discovered verses under Fighter are defaulted to English Bible version and so far I haven't been able to get KJV to show up.
replyContent: Thank you for rating us so well. We're glad the verses have motivated more Bible reading. If your Bible Translation in Preferences (Main Menu) are set to KJV, all of the sets within the app will be in KJV. Only My Verses that you enter will lock into the translation that you entered them in. Check out the Help section for more on the features.

content: Great app, but need to update the widget to be resizable. It's unusable on most devices due to the weird size. Make it shorter, or better yet please make it adjustable. I would honestly use the app more if the asthetics of the widget were better.
replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to share your suggestion. Input from users is a great help as we continually work to improve the app. I will share your suggestion with our development team for future consideration.

content: Is there anyway to get push notifications or any notifications at all?? I need the app to remind me instead of me going into the app. I have checked all settings and I don't get push notifications or any notifications at all to remind me and I have the option ticked. The app is good but without push notifications what's the use for someone who forgets to memorize or review verses??
replyContent: Yes, there are notification options. Have you seen under Preferences that you can select Remind Me to Memorize or Remind Me to Review which supersedes that once verses are memorized. This and many other features are described in the Helps section. Or feel free to contact us directly through the app with more questions. I hope this helps. Thanks.

content: Although the crashes that plagued this app on January 4 were "fixed" 2 days later, now a new update (January 8) crashes the app whenever the arrow at the upper left corner of the home screen is clicked. Disappointing 2021 performance. Back down to 2 stars. Update1: good to see the developer involved here. The latest crash resolved on jan 11. Bumping rating to 4 to test things out.
replyContent:
This issue was also fixed. If you continue to have a problem, please contact us directly from within the app for more detailed responses and help.
The crashing issue was fixed within a day of learning about it; we're very sorry for the inconvenience and stress. We wouldn't recommend wiping and reinstalling as that can cause data loss.

content: Fighter versus is my favorite memory verse app.

content: The app was having an issue causing it to fail to open but the developer has fixed the issue. This is a great app for memorizing scripture.
replyContent: I'm so sorry about Monday's glitch - it's been fixed now. While rebooting is safe, please contact us before uninstalling as that can result in data loss (e.g., in My Verses and your memorization progress).

content: It's good. I just bought it so I'm still learning the little things. I did have a question. How would I go about setting a time frame for less than a year on a whole book? I know currently it's a year, but I'm hoping there is some way I can do less. It's set at a couple of verses every 7 days, but is there a way to set it at less? Do them daily?
replyContent: Thanks. The Helps section explains many features. To do a book in a year depends on size - check out Extended Sets to see how they are set up. Once a verse is marked as memorized it comes up in daily review; those parameters can be changed in Preferences and adjusted in View Schedule for Review. Contact us thru the app if you have more questions.

content: This app is great and certainly helps my efforts to memorize God's word. There are two minor issues that don't generally affect day to day use, but are frustrating when they occur: 1) The app frequently checks for licensure, so if I'm not connected to the internet I can't use it. 2) There is no account sign in or data back up capability, so when I get a different device I have to try to remember where each verse is in the review schedule and manually set everything back up
replyContent: Thanks for commenting. 1) We are working on reducing the frequency of license verification.  2) The app does support the standard system backup when provided by the manufacturer of the device. This article may be helpful: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/113410?hl=en Contact us directly if you have further questions.

content: The user interface and content are excellent, but this app is unsuitable for anyone who has limited access to the internet due to its over frequent checking for a license key (about every other day!). This renders the app unusable if you aren't consistently online when using it.
replyContent: Thank you for the feedback and for letting us know about how frequently it asks for a license key. We'll ask our developer if there's any way to reduce the occurrences. Please contact us directly if you'd like a more detailed response.

content: Exceptional app for memorizing Scripture thru song!

content: In reply to the reply. No, it REALLY DOESN'T have spaced repetition. It isn't true. You have to change it yourself MANUALLY each time for each verse at the end of your review, and somehow remember which verses you knew and which you messed up. Impossible. And the choices are weekly or monthly, it doesn't give you the choice to review after two or three or 10 days etc. This is what it would do automatically if it were based on spaced repetition. It doesn't allow you to input whether you knew the verse or not, so it cannot possibly use spaced repetition which bases the day of next review on an algorithm based on whether you knew the answer or not. This program does NOT take into account whether you know the answer or not. Please don't pass it for what it isn't. --- Here's the original comment - It has potential, but for me it is almost useless as it DOESN'T use spaced repetition, in which you tell the program whether you knew the answer or not. So it doesn't know which verses you struggle with and which ones you know. It should give you the verses you don't know to review and the one you know keep for later, but as it does not do this it is quite unusable as it keeps asking you the verses you know and you build up tooooo many verses to review. It NEEDS to be changed to the spaced repetition method for it to be usable. It is too bad because other than that it is a very nice program. Please change this. Especially as a paid app for memorization it seems obvious it should have spaced repetition, it is quite frustrating. Also although it allows you to make folders of verses by topic, it doesn't allow you to review those folders separately. If I want to review the weak verses in my evangelism folder before I go for an outreach, for example, I can't. I must review all the verses that I already know and don't know also in all other categories. I need a way to focus on evangelism verses only from time to time.
replyContent: I'm truly sorry for misunderstanding your concern. While the app does begin with daily review, then gradually decreases the frequency to weekly, monthly, and 6-month reviews, you are absolutely correct that it doesn't adjust the schedule based on quiz performance. I'm sorry we don't have that feature at this time. Holly, info@truth78.org

content: Reading the app description actually helps!

Excited and hopeful I will at last be able to memorize and retain verses! Thank you!!
My favorite part of this app ate the quizzes. I also love that all the verses are already in the app.

The app overall is great. However the sing the verse function is only working in the fighters verses collection but not the extended memory collection. For example if you want to play the song for Matthew 6 22 to 23 . It will instead play the song for Jeremiah something for you.

I really enjoy the app overall. I just wish there were some font changes available especially for the widget, Most importantly though is i wish it could be synced to a new Android device. I just switched phones and see no way to sync to my new phone. Big BUMMER there.
I mentioned a glitch in the singing of the verse, got an email next day and it was fixed not long after!

I have been truly blessed by the app on both ios and Android. One feature request - cross-platform sync. Currently, ios uses icloud to sync across apple devices. No sync is available for Android. A platform independent cloud sync such as Dropbox would be great!
It crashes each time I open it sends me to playstore and the page then crashes or closes when I click on it
I wish they would update the app to where it would have the lock screen feature that the iPhone does. The widget is nice, but I see my lock screen more often.

I've had this app for years but never realized how powerful it is until this week when I contacted them to inquire about adding the SBL Greek New Testament. Found out, I can still use it by selecting a translation other than esv (I selected HCSB). I go to add a verse, and select copy from web. It opens a browser of the verse on biblegateway. I select SBL Greek New Testament from the translation menu, copy the text, and go back to FV and paste and save. So now I'm memorizing Romans in Greek 👊🙌
Faith driven biblical reference app. Great for verse search
Works great!
Best scripture memory app on the market. Love it!
Not child oriented, but my teens  love it, too!

I am so thankful to have found this app. It is great! My only wish is that we could choose the translation we want when selecting passages to memorize and review. I use ESV mostly, but I like NKJV also and want to continue reviewing verses I've memorized with the NKJV.

This is a great app for those looking to get serious about memorizing Scripture. It is simple enough and has great plans for those who are not sure where to start and complex enough to allow for a user to create their own memorization plans. The features for helping memorize have been helpful and there are enough of them that you should find something that will help you or provide you with many different ways to practice.

This is by far the BEST memory verse app that exists. I have been using it for several years and have many verse memorized. And I was the person who always said, "I'm not good at memorizing Scripture". But this tools works if you use it regularly. This has become a part of my daily routine.
I Wish it had the entire Bible in its database.  The only suggestion that I would make would be that.
When using select matching reference the app crashes.
replyContent: Kristher, please contact us at info@fighterverses.com so we can troubleshoot this with you - haven't heard of others having this problem.

content: And I love it!!!

I like the way you can display the verse on your home screen, but it cuts the last words off if it is a long verse. I went through a tough time lately, my minister sent a screen shot of one of the verses from your app and it really strengthened me to look at the verse easily throughout the days - which is why I bought the app. Now I find the widget cuts off the last few words! I am using a Motorola G 4G.
replyContent: Helen, If it chops off the end of a longer passage, go to that passage and tap "Use Verse on Home Screen Widget" -- this will switch it to a smaller font & display the entire passage. For further assistance, contact us at info@fighterverses.com (you'll also get a quicker response that way - I apologize for the tardy response to your post here).

content: Great tool for learning powerful verses and keeping it in your heart.
27th Street Revival Center
One of the best verse memory systems hands down.

Great app and concept. However, I've got a problem when you scroll down the page on a verse and then the GUI automatically interprets your scrolling as if you would like to go to the next verse and then it sends you to the next verse. I think the app would be a whole lot better if it didn't do this, and this defect sorta  spoils the overall experience.
Fighting the good fight of faith has never been digitally facilitated in this manner before!
Fighter Verses is an incredibly useful app; I have no problem recommending it to anyone interested in storing God's invaluable Word on their hearts and in their minds.
works great
Fighter verses for the win
Outstanding memory verse program for the whole family.

This app is perfect for keeping your mind engaged in scripture memorization. Especially useful when waiting for an appointment,  standing in lines, or walking your dogs etc. Wherever your cell is -- your verses are with you, ready to quiz you in several challenging ways.
They finally have a quiz for verses you have already memorized asking you to match the verse with the reference.

Awesome! I ve been looking for a good application for me and my kids for memorisation. This just does it! It reminds me of my sunday school times, way back! These days, kids don't do much bible memorisation, like the good old days. This, we will use fully! I guarantee you. Am downloading it on all my devices! Keep it up!
Love the songs!
Awesome way to memorize Scripture short or long.
Great, simple app to help memorizing. The tools to help practice verses are excellent. Not just for kids, either. ;-)
God had used the home screen verse very powerfully. I love that it is one for a whole week.
Great tool for learning scripture. Fun, interactive, and intuitive.
Great app! Simple to use and leaves no excuse...it reads to you, sings to you, allows you to record your own voice, quizzes you, and gives you a widget. This is awesome!
I purchased this app and  couldn't figure out how to save verses in NIV. Their customer service department was very responsive to assist me in figuring it out! Great app! Great customer service! :-)
replyContent: You can enter any verse you like if you go the main menu and press My Verses, then Add New Verse.  Thanks.

content: Love this app, have it on my tablet & iPod. Great verses for daily battles. Easy to use
DG has done a great thing for Christians in making this app. An excellent source of encouragement and an easy way to ha well the word of God on the forefront on your mind.

it really is! I have NEVER learnt verses so fast before. other methods were OK but nowhere near this effective! all I can say is, if you want to take memorising Scripture seriously (and you should; Matt 4:4, Ps 119:11, 2 Tim 3:16-17), then GET THIS!!
Works good.
Great useful app.  Love the reminders. The fill in the blank is awesome

This is a great resource to forget increase time in the word, especially in memorization.  My one wish for the app is widget customizability. I would love to be able to change the text color and the text box transparency.
Really every possible means of memorizing you can think of.
Love this app, really an encouragement. App must be in phone storage for widget to work. app support is awesome! Support this ministry
I would love to be able to use the quizzes,  but all I get are blank screens.

My 8 year old daughter uses this app on my phone as often as she can!  She has memorized this weeks verse already.  Hoping there are some from genesis as that is her fav book.  This is awesome, we were losing our edge learning our verses last year - this has reinspired us all! Thank you so much...

This app is the best for hiding God's word in your heart. The best quiz for me is the "quick blank" quiz. It's been a huge help for me and I've been able to encourage others with Scripture that I've memorized. This app makes it really easy.
It's a great way to memorize Scripture. It also has great verses picked for kids to memorize.
Great tool for parents, children, teachers, followers of Christ
Memorising scripture is powerful. This is a very helpful tool to do that with some great features.
I find this a very good system.  I've bought lots of app but felt compelled to write my first review.

The overall program is great, and the app is very helpful, especially the audio portion.  Also very customizable, and really appreciate that the listening portions are available for verses you want to do on your own,

It's really a very handy app to have on your mobile. It's easy to put the verse on the screen to memorize, it's easy to change verses by topics, it's easy to even sing those verses with kids. Plus I can add my own favorite verses. More than I expected. Thanks a lot.
Love it

I LOVE this app on so many levels. This is by far the best and most useful app on my phone. It does what it promises to do and does it excellently. It also has a ton of great features. The only thing that's missing for me is a note-taking feature, which I'm sure will come as the app gets improved. There's no good reason for any Christian not to have this app. It is worth far more than the listed price.   Update; I've had to change my rating from five to three stars because I've found the app to be buggy.
I love the singing feature which plays each verse set to music. This app does everything I could imagine for a Bible memory app and more. I'm loving it and my kids will, too!
this app is awesome!

For me, I think it is very necessary to capitalize pronouns referring to God, Jesus and the Holy Spirit. I strongly suggest that this be fixed in the next update. Also maybe adding the NKJV, if possible, would be appreciated. I do like the app and I recognise the need for the memorization of scripture, and this is an excellent tool for that.
Definitely helps my family to learn Scripture. Thank you so much for this resource.

My only suggestions are 1.  Have a low light/inverted color scheme and 2.  Make it easier to add verses from different translations by adding an option to switch translations in the verse search window.
This is one of the best verse memorization tools available!! I use it often. Bought the app for my daughter and have recommended the app to my friends. Thank you.
Excellent! Very valuable.
The quizzes are so helpful!
I love this! First time I have ever been able to quite easily memorize bible verses! Yay!
It has something for all learning styles, visual, audible, kinesthetic...  Great app.
Fighter Verses help memorization
The only problem is that the app does not stop playing music when I receive a call. Thanks.
Worth the 4 bucks. No excuse for not buying it.
"A friend loves at all times"
This is one of the top Bible apps on the market.  Very easy to navigate, and very easy to create specific verses to memorize.  Well worth the few dollars paid!
Great for kids and adults alike. Love the "sing the verse" feature and how verses are categorized. This app is worth far more than $3!
Great tool for dads who are trying to consistently teach God's Word to their children.
The only thing I would love is a way to write up verse collection on a pc and import to the app. Thank you!!

I didn't realize how much this app offered until I downloaded it so I'm glad I did. Enough scripture preloaded to do one a week for ten years. I like memorizing scripture but needed something to get back into it and this was great. I'm trying to tackle two tracks at once but the quizzes make it pretty feasible.
I was super pumped for this app mainly for the widget that puts the verse on the homescreen, but i can't find the widget... asus tf300 btw  Higher rating if i can figure this out
Great app but recently the children's portion lost the verse text that goes along with the picture, now you have to go to a completely different screen to see the actual verse text.

One of the best apps I have seen for Scripture memorization. I gave it four stars only because its biggest drawback is it cannot be installed to a SD card. I normally will not keep any app that doesn't allow me to install to a SD card - this is the only exception - hoping this much needed functionality will come in a future update!

To date, this is by far my favorite app.  I love every single feature of it and thank the Desiring God team for making it available.  It has totally revolutionized my journey in the memorization of God's Word.  Thank you!
perfectly functional
One of the best apps available, although having the NT verses available in Greek would make it even better
Love this app -- please add support for hourly reminders!
We love the fighter verse app!
Only criticism is I wish it didn't try to look like an ios app. Particularly like that you can add your own verses.
Excellent app
Awesome app for memorizing scripture. And i love that it has a topical index!
Best. App. Ever.
Keeps me moving at a steady pace.  Enough time to meditate on the Word.   Widget makes a great backdrop for home screen.  One of my top 5 apps

We use this for a small group (of 3), and talk about what we learned and the reflection questions. Great app, great ministry, would pay more if it asked. I would like the option on the widget to play with the color and opaquness on top of it all.
Love this app but it often tells me that I need to repurchase and blocks me from accessing my app.
Great
Great to have an App like this
Makes it easy to memorize scripture... Now I just gotta use it!
Great app for memorizing
Even if you only use this as a daily verse engine. It is worth the cost.As a way to memorize, it is immensely helpful, especially the quizzes in various forms.
Love the repeating voice & music!
I have been looking for something like this and then my youth pastor suggested this app and I love it!! Praise God for this app!!
Excellent for adults and children
Best of its kind. Plus check out all the extended packs of verses! If that's not enough you can even make your own!   -David
GREAT app.  I've tried several (even paid) and I like this the best. Lots of solid verses.  Like being able to add my own verses. I do wish there were a 1x4 widget option along with the current 2x4.
This is easily one of the best apps I have used. It goes beyond standard verse memorization and provides additional tools that are great! A must buy!
doesn't open
Love this app and it has a great widget!
I can do all things thru Christ who gives me strenght!!! Phil 4:13
You will be blessed,and you won't be dissapointed, truly worth the misley $3.00,if i was to endorse an app.with my life,this it
Awesome app!!!
I really liked having the widget on my home screen with the previous version.  You ruined it with the latest update.  Please put it back the way it was.
Terrific App! Tried to talk myself out of 'needing' to spend $2.99 for all of about 5 minutes. I'll spend that much on my next Starbucks! This app is worth way more than that!
This is a fantastic memorization tool.  Just wish every once in a while the sing the verse feature would work on my music player.
Love everything about this app. Only glitch I've noticed is an error when I try to play the "sing this verse" on my android samsung fascinate.
Needs a cooler looking widget: red border, logo, etc...
Very professional and full featured app. I'm impressed.
Fantastic tool not only for memory verses great for downloading sermons etc

Cannot express what an incredibly enriching & elevating tool this is for anyone seeking to enhance their Christian Studies, & flourish in the Word of our Lord God. This has answered a long awaited hope & desire for me in adding, memorizing, categorizing, & easily accessing my favorites & topical based scriptures. Much Thanks & God's Best to the DevTeam for providing this invaluable resource.
I would appreciate an option to display "my verses" on the widget.
Delighted with this app- best money I ever spent! Praise the Lord:)
Many in our church our meditating on God's word with the help of this app. Thank you!

This app has the most features out of all the scripture memory apps. As with every app there are some bugs that need fixed. The interface is really good.  For functionality only this is the best.  For user-friendly, "Verse Box Scripture Memory" and 'remember Me' are slightly better.
Does not post verses correctly to Facebook and there is no way to save the verses you're memorized in one place for later review ... good app but when you charge it should be a great app.

I enjoyed memorizing God's Word in childhood, but have not really done so since then. This has been a wonderful encouragement in memorizing Scripture again and hiding it in my heart in a very simple but powerful way.
This is awesome!  I especially like the songs that help you memorize.
It says its not licensed, but I paid for it.

I love it, it's working great so far. But I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because of a couple bugs.   1. Spelling errors: I added Psalm 103 to "My Verses". Once I saved it, it shows us as Psalmsalm 103 in the list. And I couldn't find a way to fix the spelling error. 2. Version: I selected NIV in the preferences as my Bible Translation. When I do this all the verses that are in the collection show the correct version, but the verses I added in "My Verses" still show only the ESV version.
Finally I've started memorizing verses, and this widget makes it easy.
It's awesome except for one thing.. I can't set it to remind me more often than just once daily. An option for more frequent review would be perfect!
I love this app and widget, my only request would be to add option to customize the widget's colors. Thanks!
I love this app. I had one suggestion for the widget, and that was if you could allow yourself to view your own verses that you pick out
One thing...My verses feature consistently errs in spelling. I enter 'Titus', but it posts 'Titusus'. Strange. That said, fantastic app nonetheless.
LOVE IT... i Is it possible to make audio available on the widget?
I love these verses! Thank you! Can you add healing scriptures with its own separate topic?
Thank you DG, exactly what I've been looking for!
The fighter verses widget disappeared after I rebooted my phone. The fighter verses app is there but I cannot find the widget anymore. Anyone can help? Great app!
Use it every day with the family. Love it.
Amazing android app. I find it quite useful. There r multiple ways to try & memorize it, from studying whole ch to audio! Thx Desiring God!
I like that this is on my homescreen. I would like a widget but its great that it goes to the current verse but you can also scroll past and future .
One of the best and most profitable apps you can download.
incredibly helpful
This app rocks undescribable brilliant. Thnkz
Excellent app. Could do with a widget, but great nonetheless.
Great app! Lots of features and options. Make it better with a widget please!
This app is great but it needs a widget.
Awesome memorization plans. This app is a blessing.
Great app!! Great to learn and write the word of God in ur heart..and to protect yourself against the enemy.....please install!! Thanks pastor John!!!
This is a great way to memorize important scripture! The need for this app on the market was meet by DG 110%. Maybe a widget would be a nice addition!
After Bible Connect this is now my favourite app. Good job DG.
Great. Please just develop widget for current verse.
Love it!! Thank you!
What a great tool for bible memorization!
